Our Services

CodeCrux Team has more than 10+ year of working experience on Web and mobile applications.

What we do?


We do more than just development, we help build your business.



UI & UX Design

“A user interface is like a joke. If you have to explain it, it’s not that good.” - that's what we believe in.

Web Development

Web development as a whole is an essential component for success, and our team of experts make it look simple.

Mobile Development

We excel in customising mobile app solutions which are well-thought before being implemented for a dynamically changing market.



Microservices Development

In the recent years, Microservices has grown in popularity as a distinctive method of developing software systems.

Kubernetes

We effectively adopt and integrate various test & production automation solutions.

DevOps as a Service

We provide DevOps as a service to businesses who want to deploy applications in the cloud.
